statements: UPDATE user_behavior_email_campaigns SET email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior_email_campaigns SET behavior_timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
UPDATE user_behavior_email_campaigns SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', behavior_type = 'engagement' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_behavior_email_campaigns SET behavior_type = 'conversion', behavior_timestamp = '2022-10-31 14:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'Alice', user_age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Login', behavior_timestamp = '2023-01-20 15:30:00' WHERE behavior_id = 5;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', user_age = 30 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_type = 'login', behavior_timestamp = NOW(), behavior_details = 'User logged in successfully' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_description = 'Purchase made', timestamp = '2022-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET email_subject = 'New Offers Inside!' WHERE campaign_id = 100;
UPDATE user_behavior SET behavior_description = 'user logged in', timestamp = '2022-04-08 09:30:00' WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE campaign_results SET delivery_status = 'Delivered', open_status = true, click_count = 10 WHERE result_id = 456
UPDATE users SET user_name='John Doe' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE campaign_targets SET target_segment='VIP' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE users SET user_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE campaign_targets SET target_segment = 'New Segment' WHERE campaign_id = 456 AND user_id = 789;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_recipients SET opened = true, clicked = true WHERE campaign_id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
